title: My Exclusive Dream World Adventures - Novel Updates

tags: Adapted to Manhua   Apocalypse   Beautiful Female Lead   Character Growth   Cunning Protagonist   Determined Protagonist   Dreams   Early Romance   Fast Learner   Flashbacks   Hiding True Identity   Identity Crisis   Jealousy   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Nationalism   Near-Death Experience   Nightmares   Obsessive Love   Polygamy   Pragmatic Protagonist   Survival Game   Thriller   Underestimated Protagonist   Virtual Reality   Weak to Strong   Yandere

description:
“A Virtual Dream Device? What the heck is this?”

“Is it used for daydreaming? Nope, not interested.”

“What? It could simulate reality at a hundred percent? I could live out half a year in one night’s time and bring in a replicate of a real person?

Hmm, pretty sweet I must say.”

“I’ll be the only one left in the world while the others are all gone in the first dream?”

“Uhm, I’d like to bring in a female celeb at the pinnacle of her glamor, could I?”>
